programme.title: Rali Bae Ceredigion
programme.desc: Tour European Rally is an up-and-coming rally series that combines some of Europe's most breathtaking and challenging rally events into one pan-European rally series. Each season consists of 5-6 individual events, plus annual TER promo events.

programme.title: Championnat de Belgique des Rallyes
programme.desc: The Belgian Rally Championship is one of the most fiercely contested rally championships at a national level. It also attracts prominent guest entrants such as Thierry Neuville, Craig Breen and Stéphane Lefebvre.

programme.title: Arctic Lapland Rally - A Tour European Rally Promo Event
programme.desc: Organised as a promo event by the TER, the Artic Lapland Rally is the coldest rally competition in the world. Despite temperatures dropping to -35°C, the rally attracts more than 200,000 spectators to Rovaniemi, the capital of Finnish Lappland. It's hated, but also loved among the 150 drivers taking part every year. MOTORVISION TV shows you the highlights from the 2020 Arctic Lapland Rally.

programme.title: Rallye : Rallye Dakar
programme.desc: The Dakar Rally coverage which is an annual rally raid organised by the Amaury Sport Organisation.

programme.title: Dubai International Baja
programme.desc: The Dubai International Baja, formerly known as the Dubai International Rally, is the oldest motorsport event in the United Arab Emirates. It is part of the reformed FIA World Cup for Cross-Country Bajas and based at the famous Dubai Autodrome. It will see international drivers taking on a demanding 407-kilometer stage running through the Al Qudra desert.

programme.title: Australian Offroad Championship
programme.desc: Founded in 2007, the Australian Off-Road Championship is the official Enduro championship of Motorcycling Australia. It provides a platform for all Australians that enjoy tight bush trails and fast open tracks. But its goal is not just to produce the nation's biggest off-road event, but also to produce top level off-road competitors who then move on to represent Australia in international Enduro competitions.

programme.title: Go Green! S2
programme.desc: Green, greener, greenest ... the market for alternative power sources just keeps growing, and that won't stop. Practically every automobile manufacturer has developed an electric car or a hybrid model vehicle.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S2
programme.desc: The Porsche 911. Modern design, advanced technology, everything is new but still: For 50 years, still unmistakable. And we also test the world's first series-produced plug-in hybrid with diesel engine: the Volvo V60!

programme.title: Top Ten Show S1
programme.desc: Real luxury. The kind of cars that you only dream of. On today's Top Ten Show we're going to expose the most expensive cars in production.

programme.title: Episode 11
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: GT World Challenge Europe Sprint Cup
programme.desc: Join Motorvision TV as it brings you all the action from the European sports car racing series.

programme.title: Dream Cars S2
programme.desc: They are the most spectacular convertibles in the world and the most fascinating of all automobiles: Open two-seater sports cars built for velocities exceeding 300 km/h, built for an unparalleled driving pleasure. They are the super sports cabriolets from Ferrari, Lamborghini, Porsche, Bentley and McLaren. DreamCars presents the fastest and most exclusive super sports convertibles in the world.

programme.title: Episode 4
programme.desc: Exciting sports show that follows the hottest action from the world's most unique motor sport events. Viewers will have a chance to visit some interesting competitions- from IDEMITSU 600 Super Endurance at the Chang Interna-tional Circuit in Thailand, the winter edition of the Maroc Challenge in Morocco, to the Hispania Rally, the only European rally to take place in the desert, and many more. Viewers will also find out all the news from the world of motor sports.

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Bike World is the magazine on MOTORVISION TV for all fans of the lifestyle on two wheels. Whether on the road, off-road or on the race track: Bike World brings the latest trends from the world of motorcycles into living rooms around the world. Watch the latest tests of new two-wheelers, exciting reports from the hottest events and thrilling insights into superbike racing.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S6
programme.desc: What's hot and what's not. There are quests to be undertaken, the search for the ideal auto, for the perfect race track for the ultimate accessory gadget. What are the preferred rides of the race legends?

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: The McLaren 720S Spider is the fastest convertible in the world. Its cheeky sound is anything but a posh British accent. It's the voice of an uncompromising driving machine with a high potential for addiction. Jaguar, on the other hand, presents itself as majestic. But on the back seat of the F-Pace SVR in sports mode, the Queen would probably feel sick. We also check whether the Porsche Cayenne Coupé can justify its extra price compared to the Cayenne.

programme.title: Spotted
programme.desc: Great Britain is the craziest car nation in the world: steering-wheel on the right-hand side and left-hand traffic. British cars offer anything but the average. Be it Aston Martin, Jaguar, Bentley, Morgan or McLaren: Spotted shows spectacular convertibles, coupes and supercars from the UK, shines light on crazy competitions like lawnmower racing and reveals why Britons are crazy about James Bond.

programme.title: Snow & Ice Drifting
programme.desc: Austria, at the lake Zenz, a very cool event is taking place: The snow and ice drifting, and of course here our presenter will be learning how to drift today. And he does it with the coolest rally drivers of the scene - Team Orange.

programme.title: Go Green! S2
programme.desc: The Opel Ampera is the first electric family saloon that is designed to convince anyone that's wary of electric cars. After its introduction at the 2011 Geneva Motor Show, the mid-range car is now available for sale. Plus: Blacktrail, a 20-kilogramm electric bike with an output of 14 hp and a maximum torque of 280 Nm. It's the fastest and lightest e-bike in the world.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S2
programme.desc: Europe's best show cars fight it out for the "Tuning Crown" at the Tuning World Bodensee. And: Clean and quiet, with zero emissions! Traveling with the Nissan Leaf electric car in the Norwegian capital Oslo.

programme.title: Top Ten Show S1
programme.desc: On this episode we decide what's hot and what's not in the glamorous world of cars. This time we've decided to focus on the fastest cars.

programme.title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: GT World Challenge Europe Sprint Cup
programme.desc: Join Motorvision TV as it brings you all the action from the European sports car racing series.

programme.title: MXGP of Patagonia, Vilal La Angostura
programme.desc: Lap after lap of international motorsports action. This is coverage from the FIM (Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme) Motocross World Championship where riders from all over the globe compete in high-octane, fast-paced motocross racing. Competitors battle it out in races lasting 35 minutes plus 2 laps per race.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Hungary, Budapest, Papp Laszlo SportAre
programme.desc: FIM SuperEnduro World Championship has been held since 2007. Its circuits are built inside stadiums or arenas, recreating obstacles such as rocks, boulders and logs. The championship consists of eight Grands Prix spread around the globe on courses that are mostly off-road. These events are split into two days and two different races, after which the points towards the world championship are awarded. Each round includes a motocross test and an extreme test, in addition to the enduro test.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Spain, Barcelona
programme.desc: FIM X-Trial World Championship is the most prestigious indoor motorcycle trials tournament of the world, organised by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme. The programme presents the highlights of the rounds where the participants have to take on the challenging tracks full of steep climbs and huge rocks.

programme.title: Australian Superbike Championship
programme.desc: Founded in 1980, the Australian Superbike Championship is one of the most important motorcycle racing competitions in Oceania. It is well respected as a springboard for riders and teams who aspire an international career in motorcycling. The 2022 season is contested in five classes: Superbike, Supersport, Supersport 300, the Yamaha R3 Cup and the Oceania Junior Cup.

programme.title: Go Green! S2
programme.desc: The market for alternative drive technologies just keeps growing and the best place to present the newest cars is at the biggest car show in the world, - the IAA, in Frankfurt, Germany.

programme.title: Perfect Ride S2
programme.desc: ""Cruising"": The new ""300 HorsePower Hayabusa Hardcore"" Trike or the ""New Highway"".

programme.title: Top Ten Show S1
programme.desc: Usually, when you talk about cars, it's all about their speed and velocity. But this time we've decided to turn the tables and are going to show you the opposite end of the spectrum: the ten most sluggish cars. But don't expect to see only heavy good vehicles or big vans. We have a few surprises hidden under our sleeves!

programme.title: Episode 14
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: GT World Challenge Europe Sprint Cup
programme.desc: Join Motorvision TV as it brings you all the action from the European sports car racing series.

programme.title: P1 Offshore Championship
programme.desc: The P1 Offshore Powerboat Championship promises tightly fought offshore racing with powerboats reaching top speeds of up to 100 miles per hour. Five events are schedules for the 2022 season and Motorvision.TV brings you all the thrilling action from each event!

programme.title: GP of Sharjah, UAE
programme.desc: In 2022, the UIM is once again hosting its Formula 1 World Championship in Powerboat. In the 37th season, ten teams with 19 drivers from eleven countries have signed up to fight for the title of the new world champion in three Grand Prix.

programme.title: UIM Class 1 Powerboat Championship
programme.desc: Want to cool down? The Class 1 Offshore Championship featuring boats with twin inboard 1100hp engines that can reach speeds in excess of 160mph. All boats, which are around 12-14 meters long and 3.5 meters wide, are limited by a minimum weight of 4,950 kilos.

programme.title: UIM Aquabike World Championship
programme.desc: Caution, danger of splashing! Since 1992, the Aquabike World Championship has been the most important racing series in the sport of jet skiing and one of the fastest competitions in water sports. On specially designed race courses or on the high seas, the participants engage in thrilling races in the ski and runabout categories and fascinate with all kinds of stunts on their more than 300 hp jet skis.

programme.title: Australian V8 Superboats Championship
programme.desc: The Australian V8 Superboat Championship is one of the most important watersports series from down under. Drivers compete in three different classes: the LS Class, Group A and Unlimited, which features hardly any restrictions regarding engine sizes. In 2022, a total of seven rounds are scheduled before a new champion is crowned.

programme.title: Michigan City, Indiana
programme.desc: See all the action from the USA series of P1 AquaX, an exciting Jet Ski racing event, operated by Powerboat P1. P1 AquaX is an international motorboat racing competition organised by the Union Internationale Motornautique.

programme.title: British Truck Racing
programme.desc: The Brisith Truck Racing Championship features some of the heaviest racing machines you'll ever see. Each truck weighs more than five tonnes and produces in excess of 1000bhp. The 2022 season features a total of 7 events that are contested around the United Kingdom.

programme.title: British Truck Racing
programme.desc: The Brisith Truck Racing Championship features some of the heaviest racing machines you'll ever see. Each truck weighs more than five tonnes and produces in excess of 1000bhp. The 2022 season features a total of 7 events that are contested around the United Kingdom.
